name: IT 201: Project 2
description: I created a painting tool that spawns 3D primitives where the user can left click across the screen, simulating drawing. Users can toggle “Timed Deletion” and adjust the slider in order to control how fast the shapes disappear, or toggle it off and delete it on their own. You can swap between drawing and deleting with right click or by clicking a button. There is also a “Delete All” button for faster clearing. The user can change the shape, color, size and also toggle “Random Rotation” for a unique outcome. You may also zoom in/out with the up/down arrow keys.
